build.script:
eval "$(/opt/homebrew/bin/brew shellenv)"

# use homebrew ruby
export PATH="$(brew --prefix ruby)/bin:$PATH"
export PATH="$(gem environment gemdir)/bin:$PATH"

bundle exec jekyll build

run.script:
eval "$(/opt/homebrew/bin/brew shellenv)"

# use homebrew ruby
export PATH="$(brew --prefix ruby)/bin:$PATH"
export PATH="$(gem environment gemdir)/bin:$PATH"

bundle exec jekyll serve --watch --port 4002
